mapper.insert: insert into product(image, title, link, lprice, styleId, userId, keyword, productId, createDate) values(#{image}, #{title}, #{link}, #{lprice}, #{styleId}, #{userId}, #{keyword}, #{productId}, now())
mapper.select: select s.id, s.image1, s.image2, u.username, u.profile, p.keyword from style s inner join user u on s.userId = u.id inner join product p on s.id = p.styleId where p.keyword regexp #{keyword} order by s.id desc
